title: Sidewall - Fragment, 1840–45
provenance: From the "Upstairs East" room of West College, Williamstown, Massachusetts.The building built 1796.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Henry N. Flynt
description: Single motif of a small cluster of white flower and orange flowers in drop-repeating arrangement. Fine white tendrils make an all-over pattern on the ground. Adhering to the back of this paper were found fragments of a newspaper which semed to recount events of the 1790s.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall - Fragment, 1840–45.
1840–45. Block-printed. Gift of Mrs. Henry N. Flynt. 1955-41-1.
